alert.note: Alert for Glades; Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 4:25PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hendry, southwestern Palm Beach and south central Glades Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 424 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud 9 miles west of Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge, or 15 miles southeast of Montura, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds, wind gusts up to 50 mph, and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clewiston, Moore Haven, Montura, Lake Harbor, Holey Land Wildlife Refuge, Big Cypress Seminole Reservation, Devils Garden, Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge, Harlem and Lake Hicpochee. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Glades; Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County
